column4: i resized my root partition and now it doesn't seem to recognize the extra space
maybe you didn't resize the file system as well
you need to tell the file system about the extra space
ah ok i was just about to say it said there was already a journal
you need sth like sudo resize2fs /dev/whatever <size>
ok thanks, i will try that now
yes it is. will i have to boot from a cd to resize the root filesysteM?
and careful with the size as well
it might break if you make it larger than the actual partition
